content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour" )
( ing-1 "2 teaspoons baking soda" )
( ing-2 "1/2 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-3 "6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped" )
( ing-4 "1/2 cup unsalted butter" )
( ing-5 "2 1/2 cups dark brown sugar" )
( ing-6 "3 eggs" )
( ing-7 "1 1/2 tablespoons vanilla extract" )
( ing-8 "1 cup sour cream" )
( ing-9 "1 cup water" )
( ing-10 "6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped" )
( ing-11 "1/4 cup unsalted butter" )
( ing-12 "1 egg yolk" )
( ing-13 "4 cups confectioners' sugar" )
( ing-14 "2 tablespoons vanilla extract" )
( ing-15 "2 tablespoons heavy cream" )
( ing-16 "1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened" )
( ing-17 "2 cups bittersweet chocolate chips" )
( ing-18 "1 cup heavy cream" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Sift"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the flour"@17:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "baking soda"@28:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "salt"@44:48 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "heat"@34:38 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "6 ounces chocolate"@39:57 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "the top of a double boiler"@6:32 / TOOL )
		:simultaneous ( ac-4-1 "stirring"@59:67 / AC )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until chocolate is melted and smooth"@82:118 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm.
6) In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "cream"@20:25 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the butter"@35:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "brown sugar"@50:61 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until light and fluffy"@62:84 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Beat in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the eggs"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "one at a time"@20:33 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "stir in"@40:47 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla"@48:70 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Beat in the flour mixture alternately with the sour cream.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Beat in"@4:11 / AC
		:ppt ( "the flour mixture"@12:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "the sour cream"@47:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin).
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Stir in"@4:11 / AC
		:ppt ( "boiling water"@12:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-10-0 "batter will be thin"@27:46 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 12) Bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
content.eamr:
( inst-12 / R
	:inform ( ac-12-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:loc ( tool-12-0 "the preheated oven"@12:30 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-12-0 "35 to 40 minutes"@35:51 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-12-0 "until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean"@56:126 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 13) Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely.
content.eamr:
( inst-13 / R
	:inform ( ac-13-0 "cool"@8:12 / AC
		:loc ( tool-13-0 "pan"@16:19 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-13-0 "10 minutes"@24:34 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-13-1 "cool"@71:75 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-13-2 "turn out"@41:49 / AC
		:gol ( tool-13-1 "a wire rack"@55:66 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 14) Make the Chocolate Buttercream Frosting: In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-14 / R
	:inform ( ac-14-0 "heat"@76:80 / AC
		:subtask ( "Make the Chocolate Buttercream Frosting"@4:43 / OTHER )
		:loc ( tool-14-0 "the top of a double boiler"@48:74 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "6 ounces chocolate"@81:99 / FOOD )
		:simultaneous ( ac-14-1 "stirring"@101:109 / AC )
		:until ( cond-14-0 "until chocolate is melted and smooth"@124:160 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 15) In a large bowl, whip the butter for about 10 minutes until it is super fluffy, beat in egg yolk.
content.eamr:
( inst-15 / R
	:inform ( ac-15-0 "whip"@21:25 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-11 "the butter"@26:36 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-15-0 "10 minutes"@47:57 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-15-0 "until it is super fluffy"@58:82 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-15-0 "a large bowl"@7:19 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-15-1 "beat in"@84:91 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-12 "egg yolk"@92:100 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 16) Gradually blend in the confectioners' sugar, alternating with 2 tablespoons vanilla and 2 tablespoons cream, then blend in the melted chocolate.
content.eamr:
( inst-16 / R
	:inform ( ac-16-0 "blend in"@14:22 / AC
		:simultaneous ( ac-16-1 "alternating"@49:60 / AC
			:ppt ( ing-14 "2 tablespoons vanilla"@66:87 / FOOD )
			:ppt ( ing-15 "2 tablespoons cream"@92:111 / FOOD )
		)
		:ppt ( ing-13 "the confectioners' sugar"@23:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-16-2 "blend in"@118:126 / AC
		:ppt ( "the melted chocolate"@127:147 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 17) Beat in the softened cream cheese.
18) Make the Ganache: In a large saucepan, combine chocolate chips and 1 cup heavy cream.
content.eamr:
( inst-18 / R
	:inform ( ac-18-0 "combine"@43:50 / AC
		:subtask ( "Make the Ganache"@4:20 / OTHER )
		:loc ( tool-18-0 "a large saucepan"@25:41 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-17 "chocolate chips"@51:66 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-18 "1 cup heavy cream"@71:88 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 19) Heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-19 / R
	:inform ( ac-19-0 "Heat"@4:8 / AC
		:simultaneous ( ac-19-1 "stirring"@10:18 / AC )
		:until ( cond-19-0 "until chocolate is melted and smooth"@31:67 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 20) Remove from heat and set aside.
21) Assemble the cake: When cake is completely cooled, cover the bottom cake layer with as much ganache as desired.
content.eamr:
( inst-21 / R
	:inform ( ac-21-0 "cover"@55:60 / AC
		:subtask ( "Assemble the cake"@4:21 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( "the bottom cake layer"@61:82 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "ganache"@96:103 / FOOD )
		:when ( cond-21-0 "When cake is completely cooled"@23:53 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 22) Refrigerate for 5 minutes, or until ganache has set.
content.eamr:
( inst-22 / R
	:inform ( ac-22-0 "Refrigerate"@4:15 / AC
		:duration ( dur-22-0 "5 minutes"@20:29 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-22-0 "until ganache has set"@34:55 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 24) Cover with top layer of cake.
25) Frost top and sides with buttercream, and garnish with more ganache.
